testcase.name: Create a user with correct inputs
testcase.system-out: When user logs in to the application using user "Luke" and password "Skywalker".passed When user is in the home page...............................................passed When user clicks on create link.............................................passed Then user enters fname "Mesut"..............................................passed Then user will provide lname "Özil".........................................passed Then user will give stDate "2020-01-01".....................................passed Then user should enter email "mesut.ozil@gmail.com".........................passed Then user clicks Add button.................................................passed

testcase.name: Update a user details
testcase.system-out: When user logs in to the application using user "Luke" and password "Skywalker".passed When user is in the home page...............................................passed When user Clicks on user "Mesut Özil" entry.................................passed When user clicks on edit link...............................................passed Then user enters fname "Zlatan".............................................passed Then user clicks on update button...........................................passed And updated name "MesutZlatan Özil" should reflect..........................passed

testcase.name: delete a user
testcase.system-out: When user logs in to the application using user "Luke" and password "Skywalker".passed When user is in the home page...............................................passed When user Clicks on user "MesutZlatan Özil" entry...........................passed When user clicks on delete link.............................................passed Then user clicks on OK button...............................................passed Then the username "MesutZlatan Özil" should not be visible..................passed Then close browser..........................................................passed

testcase.name: check Titile
testcase.system-out: When user is in the login page..............................................passed Then Title should be "CafeTownsend-AngularJS-Rails".........................passed Then Close the browser......................................................passed

testcase.name: Login functionality test
testcase.system-out: When user is in the login page..............................................passed When User enters username "Luke" and password "Skywalker"...................passed And clicks on Login button..................................................passed Then validate usename "Luke" is visible.....................................passed Then Close the browser......................................................passed
